question: What is the name of a color scheme that combines white, gray, black, or beige with ONE other color as an accent?<image 1>
options: ['Monochromatic Color Scheme', 'Complementary Color Scheme', 'Analogous Color Scheme', 'Accented Neutral Color Scheme']
description: The image shows a person standing in front of a white door. The person is wearing a plaid shirt with shades of gray and black, dark blue jeans, and gray knee-high boots. They have a red scarf wrapped around their neck. The overall outfit combines neutral colors (white, gray, black, and beige) with a single accent color (red).
